title: Can't Change Status Message?
body: So I've had the same status message for a while and just went to change it, but I can't. I click to change and nothing happens. I've logged out and back in, turned off my internet and computer etc, but nothing seems to be working. Am I just being a total dummy and doing it wrong or is it bugged?

replies.body: Update of the client put it in the little settings thing, i still forget every time i go to change my status, was a %%%%ty change honestly.
